Title: Combat-ready, attackers will be destroyed!
Designer: Ma Yuru (马玉如)Hu Zhenyu (胡振宇)
Publisher: Zhejiang renmin meishu chubanshe (浙江人民美术出版社)
Notes: The text in the left-hand corner warns American invaders that the Chinese people are willing to fight to their deaths in defending the nation.
Theme: Foreign imperialistsPeople's MilitiaPeople's Liberation ArmyPeople's Liberation Army Air Force (PLAAF)People's Liberation Army Navy
